oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Future research priorities of Organic Agriculture. Policy paper of the IFOAM EU Group
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: IFOAM EU, Regional Group
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Policy environments and social economy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This policy paper presents the main research priorities for organic farming agreed by the IFOAM EU Group. It identifies the main clusters both in a table format and with a more detailed explanation of the individual priorities. The paper was discussed at the board meeting of 13th March 2004, amended by additional input from national farmersâ€™ associations and various research institutes from all EU members, revised with a priorisation exercise at the board meeting of 26th June in Lednice (Czech Rep) and finally was reviewed and approved at the board meeting in Bonn the 3rd September.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: IFOAM EU, Regional Group (2004) Future research priorities of Organic Agriculture. Policy paper of the IFOAM EU Group. International Federation of Organic Agriculture Movements - EU Regional Group.
